section.title: EVMConditionList
section.para: EVMConditionList returns the list of policy condition IDs and names defined for a given policy. If policyId is an asterisk ("*"), all or none, the method returns all conditions.

listitem.para: Input: The ID of a policy. If policyId is an asterisk ("*"), all or none, the output includes all conditions.
Output: VmdbwsSupport..ConditionListArray. Each VmdbwsSupport..ConditionList contains the name and guid of the condition for the specified policyId.

formalpara.title: Examples
formalpara.para: The following examples demonstrate EVMConditionList usage:

example.title: EVMConditionList WSDL
example.programlisting: <message name="EVMConditionList"> <part name="policyGuid" type="xsd:string" /> </message> <message name="EVMConditionListResponse"> <part name="return" type="typens:VmdbwsSupport..ConditionListArray" /> </message> ... <xsd:complexType name="VmdbwsSupport..ConditionList"> <xsd:all> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="guid" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:all> </xsd:complexType>

example.title: EVMConditionList Output (Java)
example.screen:
